Course Content: The course introduces the basic principles of the personal software process and help individual engineers to improve their performance by bringing discipline to the way they develop software. Students start with the PSP0 process, where they use their current programming practices. The PSP process is enhanced through seven process versions, with students writing one or two programs with each PSP version. For each program, they use the process methods just introduced, as well as all of the methods introduced with the previous process versions.
